summary: The diff modifies DemoDataSeeder and metadata files but does not add the required static image asset, and it does not provide clear evidence that the ₹199 product’s images array was updated to use the exact requested ExternalBlob.fromURL path.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a new custom 400x400 product image at `frontend/public/assets/generated/kids-worksheets-199.dim_400x400.png` suitable for a storefront thumbnail.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added files, so the required PNG asset under `frontend/public/assets/generated` is not present in the change set.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update DemoDataSeeder so the INR ₹199 product uses `ExternalBlob.fromURL('/assets/generated/kids-worksheets-199.dim_400x400.png')` in its `images` array.
missing_requirements.reason: DemoDataSeeder.tsx is truncated and the shown portion only references other generated image paths; there is no visible evidence of the specific `kids-worksheets-199.dim_400x400.png` URL being used for the ₹199 product.
evidence: frontend/src/components/DemoDataSeeder.tsx (truncated) shows images like `/assets/generated/digital-art-abstract.dim_400x400.png` but not the requested kids-worksheets-199 path.

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata updated to describe building a large kids worksheets catalog (11,000+ worksheets).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is only about setting a custom image for the ₹199 product; updating project state to a different/expanded scope is not requested.
evidence: project_state.json (truncated) summary: "including adding a large product catalog (11,000+ worksheets)."
